item.description:
Friends, if you're like me, you're ready for good weather! I am ready to put my coats in storage and pack away my scarves. But, regardless of the weather outside, we'll have a good time inside this Saturday.

It's been a while since we had a potluck, and the ones that we have had have been so much fun with delicious food. So, please bring a dish with you tonight to share (and any utensils that you would need to serve it...some of ours have walked off). Then after dinner, let the games begin!

Feel free to bring any favorite games that you might have. Also, for those who are new to the group, we are a household with cats, who will both be put away for the evening.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: A Potluck in April
